channel.title: [Faction Suggestion] Vampires
channel.description:
**WARNING** these classes may be highly unbalanced. This is just a concept of a completely new Faction that could bring something fresh to Throne of Lies.
**Vampire Hunter** Passive 1: Immune to Occupation and conversion by Vampires.
Night Ability 1: Scout a player's house to determine if they are a Vampire or not. (Unlimited Uses) Night Ability 2: If targeted player is a Vampire, bypass death immunity and kill them. (3 Uses)
**Vampire Lord** [Special/Invest] Passive 1: Immune to Occupation and Death Passive 2: When you die, if a Vampire with Royal Blood is alive, they become the Vampire Lord.
Day Ability 1: Your Drain Blood ability will attack all players that visit targeted player, along with attacking the targeted player. (2 Uses) Day Ability 2: Gaze into someone, preventing them from using their Day abilities today. (3 Uses)
Night Ability 1: Convert someone into a Vampire. You can only have 2 other Vampires. (Unlimited Uses) Night Ability 2: Drain the blood of selected player, killing them instantly. (Unlimited Uses)
**Vampire Servant** (Converted Butler) Passive 1: Immune to Occupation.
Night Ability 1: Occupy selected player. (Unlimited Uses) Night Ability 2: Guard a Vampire, occupying all who visits them. (3 Uses)
**Vampire Mistress** (Converted Princess)
Night Ability 1: Determine what type the targeted player is. (Unlimited Uses) Night Ability 2: Seduce targeted player, causing them to target selected player instead. (3 Uses) (Acts like a Debauch)
**Vampire Guard** (Converted Knight) Passive 1: Death Immune while guarding a Vampire.
Night Ability 1: Guard selected Vampire, killing everyone who attacks them. (2 Uses)
**Vampire Duke** (Converted Noble)
Day Ability 1: (Noble's political pressure) Day Ability 2: (Noble's twin)
Night Ability 1: (Noble's snoop) Night Ability 2: (Noble's spy)
**Vampire Stalker** (Converted Hunter) Passive 1: Immune to Occupation.
Night Ability 1: If targeted player visits another player, occupy them and kill them. (3 Uses) Night Ability 2: Reveal to the Vampire Lord who the targeted player visits at Night. (2 Uses)
